task.title: View Data Categories
task.shortdesc: View the names of defined data categories on theData Collections page.

step.cmd: Open the Data Collections screen, by clicking the Data Collections icon in the left navigation bar.

info.p: The Data Collections page opens showing the defined data categories.

result.p: If you are a , you can also view data category names from the System Configuration Data Categories screen.

Open the System Configuration screen, by clicking the System Configuration icon. Then click the Data Categories tab to open the Data Categories screen. At the right side of the Choose Category to Edit field, click the drop-down list to see the list of defined data categories.
